titles.title: Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 4078) to provide that no agency may take any significant regulatory action until the unemployment rate is equal to or less than 6.0 percent.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-623, by Ms. Foxx.

The resolution provides that the amendment to H.R. 4078 printed in section 2 of the resolution shall be considered as adopted in the House and in the Committee of the Whole. The resolution does not provide any waivers.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 152.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in House

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 741.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/25/2012--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 4078 (Regulatory Freeze for Jobs Act of 2012).
